page.title: 16 FAMILY LIFE
page.content: On Sundays I wake up between 7am and 8am. I have breakfast of cereals and toast. I get ready for church which is at 10am. The church we attend is St.Mary's R.C. in Evesham. Mass usually takes about an hour and is said by Father Kenny. We return from church and have lunch about 1pm. Lunch usually consists of roast meat and vegetables. After lunch we take the dogs for a walk over the fields. When we come home we play in the garden if the weather is fine and afterwards we have tea. Later in the evening we have a bath and wash our hair ready for school the next day.
